name: IRCord-Lite
description: Minimalistic and lightweight, IRC-like Discord style for compact, light theme. - Applies only to web-based Discord client. - "Compact Mode" is recommended - ""Light Theme"" is recommended - Guild/server list is hidden by default, hover the mouse over the right side to bring it up - For Pins, Mentions and Userlist - you need to use hotkeys
additional_info:
v0.3 (06.05.2019)
- added preliminary support for Cozy mode
- added preliminary support for Dark mode


v0.2a (04.05.2019)
- fixed some issues and restored user account bar

v0.2 (03.05.2019)
- updated for latest changes
- dropped server banner removal because buggy
- server bar is now an overlay rather than shrinking element
- added floating search
- Pins and Mentions hotkeys now work.
- more compact channel list
